```{r}
library(tidyverse)

setwd("./PRSA_Data_20130301-20170228")
files = list.files()
all<-map(files, read_csv) %>% 
  bind_rows() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```


```{r}
all %>%  
  group_by(year) %>% 
  summarize(avg_pm25=mean(pm2_5, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=year, y=avg_pm25)) +
  geom_line()
```
